## Evaluation Phase

We are currently in the pre-evaluation phase. This involves

```{r echo = FALSE}

unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("circle", fill = "#e4e4e4", height = "15px"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-circle", fill = "#428bca", height = "15px"))

pre <- tibble(
  
  phase = c("Pre-Evaluation",
            "",
            ""),
  
  task = c("Gathering a team",
           "Thinking about potential programs",
           "Submitting a prospectus"),
  
  completed <- c(unchecked,
               unchecked,
               unchecked)
  
)

```

<center>
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
  pre %>%
  kbl(col.names = c("Phase", "Task", "Current"),
      "html",
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'llc') %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "10em", color = "#ffffff") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "10em", color = "#ffffff") %>%
  column_spec(3, width = "20em", color = "#ffffff") %>% 
  row_spec(0:3, extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;', color = "#ffffff", background = "transparent") 
```
</center>

## Recommended Materials
For a look at what to consider when choosing teammates, take a look at [a] [Manager's guide to evaluation](https://www.betterevaluation.org/en/managers_guide) by *Jane Davidson*.
